item.title: RSP4J: An API for RSP
item.description:
RSP4J is a library to build RDF Stream Processing (RSP) Engines according with the reference model RSP-QL.

RSP4J is inspired by the OWL API, and other work that aim at spreading the Semantic Web (Stream Reasoning) research by means of practical and usable software tools.

item.title: StreamingMASSIF
item.description: StreamingMASSIF allows to perform cascading reasoning by combining various components. In its standard configuration it allows to filter meaningful events from a datastream through RDF Stream Processing, abstract the selection through DL reasoning and perform Complex Event Processing ontop of these abstraction.
